meanings.definition: The act of emblazoning or adorning with a design or symbol.
meanings.sent1: The emblazonments on the shield were intricate and colorful.
meanings.sent2: She admired the emblazonments on the tapestry hanging in the hall.
meanings.sent3: The emblazonments on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His words were like emblazonments on her heart, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The emblazonments on the flag fluttered proudly in the wind.

meanings.definition: Decorative designs or symbols used for adornment.
meanings.sent1: The emblazonments on the dress sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent2: The emblazonments on the vase added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The emblazonments on the cupcakes made them too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an emblazonment that brightened up the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The emblazonments on the necklace caught the sunlight beautifully.

meanings.definition: The process of displaying or exhibiting prominently.
meanings.sent1: The emblazonments of her achievements were showcased in the trophy cabinet.
meanings.sent2: The emblazonments of the banner drew attention to the event.
meanings.sent3: The emblazonments of the advertisement were hard to miss.
meanings.sent4: His charisma was an emblazonment that captivated everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The emblazonments of the painting stood out against the plain walls.
